name: News Kit Elementor Addons
author: BlazeThemes

sections.description:
Home | All themes | Blog | Support

All News focused elementor widgets that you are looking for in Elementor Page Builder. Currently, with 57 feature rich widgets and theme builder you can develop a complete news or blog website easily.
Note: Theme Builder only works fully well with the themes from BlazeThemes.

GENERIC WIDGETS

  • Site Logo & Title – Displays your site title, logo and site tagline
  • Site Nav Menu – Choose from dropdown list of menus you created to display it on front
  • Site Nav Mega Menu – Choose from dropdown list of menus you created and added mega menu
  • Phone Call – Redirects to phone dial for ease of users
  • Mailbox – Redirects to mail box for ease of users
  • Back To Top – Visitors can jump to the top of the website
  • Live Search – Allows to view summary results of the keywords entered in the search field
  • Date & Time – Displays date and realtime clock countdown
  • Random News – Redirects to the random news post
  • Live Now Button – Custom button for redirection
  • Theme Mode – Switch between light and dark mode
  • Advanced Heading – Display your titles with advanced animations and transitions
  • Tags Cloud – List out tags in your way
  • Canvas Menu – Displays the chosen template in canvas popover

LAYOUTS WIDGETS

  • Ticker News Marquee – Display posts in marquee transition effects
  • Full Width Banner – Display posts or custom content as slider
  • Main Banner 1 – Display posts in unique styles
  • Main Banner 2
  • Main Banner 3
  • Main Banner 4
  • Main Banner 5
  • Popular Opinions – Highlight some of the popular opinions
  • News List 1 – Display posts in list layouts
  • News List 2
  • News List 3
  • News Grid 1 – Display posts in grid layouts
  • News Grid 2
  • News Grid 3
  • News Carousel 1 – Display posts in carousel form
  • News Carousel 2
  • News Carousel 3
  • News Block 1 – Display posts as featured and trailing posts along it
  • News Block 2
  • News Block 3
  • News Block 4
  • News Filter 1 – Display posts as featured and trailing posts along it and also has filter tabs
  • News Filter 2
  • News Filter 3
  • News Filter 4
  • Category Collection – Allows to select categories to display as grid or carousel
  • News Timeline – Add historic or special events and display as timeline

Support

For support, please visit [https://forum.blazethemes.com/news-elementor].

Credits

License: The MIT License

Typed.js

URL: https://github.com/mattboldt/typed.js
License: The MIT License
sections.installation:
Note : As this plugin is addon, it only works with Elementor. Make sure you have Elementor installed.
The easy way to install the plugin is via WordPress.org plugin directory.

  1. Go to WordPress Dashboard > Plugins > Add New
  2. Search for “News Kit Elementor Addons” and install the plugin.
  3. From file explorer > Upload the `my-plugin` directory to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory
  4. Activate Plugin from “Plugins” menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
What themes are supported by this plugin?

News Kit Elementor Addons supports all the themes that are developed with WordPress compatibility

Does plugin theme builder supported in all the themes?

News Kit Elementor Addons theme builder supports only the themes that are developed by BlazeThemes
